Monster ID7118

Maniacal monkeys are located in Kruk's Dungeon which the player visits during Monkey Madness II.

Compared to the skeletal monkeys in the Ape Atoll Dungeon, maniacal monkeys may be seen as a better choice for players wishing to train Ranged or Magic with multi-target attacks due to their extremely dense spawn and much lower defence. However, the effects of the salve amulet(ei) do not apply to maniacal monkeys, whilst they do for the skeletal monkeys. On the other hand, maniacal monkeys have a high aggression range and come in large quantities, and also commonly drop one-dose prayer potions to replenish prayer points. These potions are dropped more frequently than used, reducing the overall cost of training here.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Maniacal monkeys now drop small ninja monkey bones instead of small zombie monkey bones, yielding more Prayer experience.

26 January 2017
(update)

Maniacal monkeys no longer drop zombie champion scrolls.

26 May 2016
(update)

Maniacal monkeys received a graphical update to appear similar to their Hunter counterparts instead of monkey zombie.

12 May 2016
(update)

Maniacal monkeys no longer drop rune scimitars.
